name: Rewind, Unwind
description:
Rewind yourself back into a large sized Yarn Ball! 

Play with keyboard or controller! Follow the string and make yourself a full sized yarn ball. 

Move with WASD or Left Control Stick

Control the Camera with Arrow Keys, Mouse (to be fixed) or Right Control Stick

Press Space, 'A' (XBox Controller) or 'X' (PlayStation Controller) to jump from directly under if your string is too high!

Game made for Brackey's 2020 Game Jam 2. Unfortunately, it didn't upload in submissions properly. Re-uploaded here!
